titleStmt.title: To His Grace, His Majesties High Commissioner, and the right honourable the Estates of Parliament. The humble supplication of John Mcdonald of Glencoe for himself, and in name of Alexander Mcdonald of Achatriechatan, and the poor remnent that is left of that family.
titleStmt.author: McDonald, John, of Glencoe, fl. 1695.

titleStmt.title: To His Grace, His Majesties High Commissioner, and the right honourable the Estates of Parliament. The humble supplication of John Mcdonald of Glencoe for himself, and in name of Alexander Mcdonald of Achatriechatan, and the poor remnent that is left of that family.
titleStmt.author: McDonald, John, of Glencoe, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Requests 'relief and redress' for the sufferings that have been incurred due to the Massacre of Glencoe.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: [Macdonald, Alexander, or MacIan of Glencoe d. 1692]
